We presented our work consisting in the identification of areas of less constraints (environmental and social) for the settlement of floating offshore wind farms via a spatial optimization approach.


> View the online conference proceedings of merIGéo 2023: [https://www.merigeo.fr/Edition-2023/Actes-du-colloque](https://www.merigeo.fr/Edition-2023/Actes-du-colloque).       

This work is the result of a collaboration as part of the multidisciplinary research project [APPEAL](https://www.geo4seas.com/en/projets/appeal/) (Agence Nationale de la Recherche - France Energies Marines)
